item.title: Post: Notice
item.description: A notice displays information that explains nearby content. Often used to call attention to a particular detail. When using Kramdown {: .notice} can be added after a sentence to assign the .notice to the <p></p> element. Changes in Service: We just updated our privacy policy here to better service our customers. We recommend reviewing the changes. {: .notice} Primary Notice: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer nec odio.
